subject: Urgent Stock Alert
body:
Oil Prices Through the Roof, Gas over $3 A Gallon!
Distributed Power Inc.
Symbol: DPWI
Price: $0.14
Oil keeps climbing and investors are loving it. DPWI has just announced the acquisition of 750,000 barrels of oil. Think of the huge profit spike this will create. Get on DPWI first thing Monday!
